tasks.name: Kickoff Meeting
tasks.desc: Schedule and conduct the project kickoff meeting with all stakeholders to outline project goals and expectations.

tasks.name: Requirements Gathering
tasks.desc: Collect and document all project requirements from stakeholders to ensure clarity and alignment.

tasks.name: Design Phase
tasks.desc: Complete the design phase of the project, including wireframes and prototypes for review.

tasks.name: Development Sprint 1
tasks.desc: Initiate the first development sprint, focusing on core features as defined in the project scope.

tasks.name: User Acceptance Testing
tasks.desc: Conduct user acceptance testing to validate that the project meets the agreed-upon requirements.

tasks.name: Read 'Atomic Habits'
tasks.desc: Finish reading 'Atomic Habits' by James Clear to gain insights into building effective habits.

tasks.name: Online Course Completion
tasks.desc: Complete the online course on data analysis to enhance my skills in interpreting data sets.

tasks.name: Weekly Reflection Journal
tasks.desc: Maintain a weekly reflection journal to track personal growth and areas for improvement.

tasks.name: Networking Event Participation
tasks.desc: Attend a local networking event to connect with professionals in my field and expand my network.

tasks.name: Fitness Challenge
tasks.desc: Participate in a 30-day fitness challenge to improve physical health and well-being.

tasks.name: Venue Booking
tasks.desc: Secure a venue for the upcoming corporate event, ensuring it meets capacity and technical requirements.

tasks.name: Catering Service Selection
tasks.desc: Choose a catering service that offers a diverse menu suitable for all dietary restrictions.

tasks.name: Guest List Finalization
tasks.desc: Finalize the guest list and send out invitations to ensure timely RSVPs.

tasks.name: Audio/Visual Setup
tasks.desc: Coordinate the setup of audio/visual equipment for presentations and entertainment.

tasks.name: Event Day Coordination
tasks.desc: Oversee all activities on the day of the event to ensure everything runs smoothly.

tasks.name: Complete First Draft
tasks.desc: 'Finish the first draft of my novel by the end of November to stay on track with my writing goals.'
